alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 11:20AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mississippi, central Tipton and southwestern Lauderdale Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1120 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marie, or over Wilson, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Osceola, Wilson, Keiser, Fort Pillow State Park, Munford, Brighton, Bassett, Marie, Fulton, Tipton, Atoka, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Egypt, Evadale, Driver, Grider and Golden Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
